original_text:
“My people have been lost sheep;
    their shepherds have led them astray
    and caused them to roam on the mountains.
They wandered over mountain and hill
    and forgot their own resting place.
korean_text: 내 백성은 잃어 버린 양 떼로다 그 목자들이 그들을 곁길로 가게 하여 산으로 돌이키게 하였으므로 그들이 산에서 언덕으로 돌아다니며 쉴 곳을 잊었도다

sentences.original_text: My people have been lost sheep
sentences.korean_translation: 내 백성은 길 잃은 양이 되었고

sentences.original_text: their shepherds have led them astray
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 목자들이 그들을 길 잃게 하였으며

sentences.original_text: and caused them to roam on the mountains
They wandered over mountain and hill
and forgot their own resting place
